description: Try our easy to follow Italian Crepes With Roasted Pumpkin And Ricotta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Italian Crepes With Roasted Pumpkin And Ricotta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs unsalted butter, melted and cooled
0.5 cup parmesan cheese, grated (2 tbs grated parmesan extra)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Peel, seed and chop the pumpkin, then toss in 1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil and season with salt. Arrange in a lined oven tray and bake for 1 hour, until browned and completely softened. Purée in a food processor, then place in a sieve and hang for 2 hours to remove excess water.
Mix the pumpkin with the ricotta, grated parmesan and nutmeg, then season with salt and pepper. Set aside.

Meanwhile, whisk the flour, eggs, milk and melted butter in a bowl and season with salt. Stand for 30 minutes, then strain through a fine sieve. Cook as 8 fine crepes in a non-stick frying pan over a moderate heat.

Divide the pumpkin mixture into eight pieces and form each into a log. Wrap with a crepe, slice into three piece, then arrange these on a lined oven tray. Bake for 10-12 minutes, until warmed through, then serve with the remaining olive oil, sage, pine nuts, parmesan and lemon.
